title: Tips for Eating Lighter This Summer
description: Sam the Cooking Guy has four easy to follow tips for eating on the lighter side this summer. Thank you for watching.

asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond
asset.hookText: http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/bbb-video/summer-eating-lighter-is-where-its-at/ Sam the Cooking Guy has four easy to follow tips for eating on the lighter ...

transcripts: How about some lighter ideas for summer eating? Instead of heavily sauced barbecued chicken, why not try a delicious grilled steak salad? And forget the traditional hamburger. Make yourself an amazing spicy salmon version instead. Potato salad as a side dish is great. But grilled veggies will always be your much lighter friend. And rather than a heavy dessert, go with fresh berries and fruit sorbet for about half the fat and calories. Four simple ideas that your mouth and waist will love.
